column6:
"Man of Stone," Part 4,2006,11
It's high noon in the mountains of Afghanistan. As Frank Castle and his ragtag crew of mercenaries square off against General Nikolai Alexandrovich Zakharov - a.k.a. "The Man of Stone" - and a battalion of Russian Marines. The Punisher is boxed in, outmanned - just the way he likes it.
32 PGS./Explicit Content ...$2.99
